name: Blaze (PrinceIsRandom)
description:
Description:

Thanks for Playing!!!!

Play as a small star, charging around protecting the galaxy from threats and surving the horrors  of space. In this 2D particle heavy simulation, you play to survive incoming asteroids and puzzle through maze like levels increasing in difficulty.

Weekly Game Jam Game (Charge).

Credit: Prince (me) All scripts and assets were created by me.

Links: I'm super proud of how it turned out, I did document my progress and methods and will be uploading the video to my youtube page: 

Channel:     https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCna1doUbb3JjG2AjSBTYH1g 

Controls:

  • LeftMouseButton: Charge
